title: The best Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '175g margarine', '50g butter', '225g caster sugar', '4 eggs, beaten', '1 dash vanilla extract', '225g self-raising flour', '1 dash milk', 'For the buttercream', '150g unsalted butter', '225g icing sugar, sifted', '2 tablespoons hot milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Extras', 'raspberry jam', 'strawberries']
